name: PlatformJumper
description:
Description

PlatformJumper is a very aptly named game, you jump on platforms.

The game features 15 levels with new obstacles every 5 levels.

Those obstacles include: Platforms, Falling Rocks, and Rising Lava.

System Requirements

OS: Windows 7 64bit or newer

CPU: Intel i3 2310m @ 2.1Ghz or AMD equivalent

GPU: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or AMD equivalent

RAM: 4GB

HDD: ~70MB after install

Installation

Step 1: Run "PlatformJumperInstaller.exe"

Step 2: Follow the instructions in the installer.

Step 3: Double click the "PlatformJumper" icon on your desktop.

Controls Keyboard

Esc = Close

R = Restart Level

M = Return to main menu

W = Jump

A = Left

D = Right

Controller

Back = Close

Y = Restart Level

Start = Return to main menu

A = Jump/Select (Main Menu)

Dpad Left = Left

Dpad Right = Right

Special thanks to 3kliksphilip for music used in this game!
